queries.description: Privileged containers lack essential security restrictions and should be avoided by removing the 'privileged' flag or by changing its value to false

queries.query_name: Non Kube System Pod With Host Mount
queries.description: A non kube-system workload should not have hostPath mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-parca-agent' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/sys/fs/bpf' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-parca-agent' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/sys/fs/bpf' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-parca-agent' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/run' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-parca-agent' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/run' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-parca-agent' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/lib/modules' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-parca-agent' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/lib/modules' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-parca-agent' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/sys/fs/cgroup' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-parca-agent' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/sys/fs/cgroup' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-parca-agent' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/sys/kernel/debug' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-parca-agent' of kind 'DaemonSet' in a non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/sys/kernel/debug' mounted

queries.query_name: PSP Allows Containers To Share The Host Network Namespace
queries.description: Check if Pod Security Policies allow containers to share the host network namespace.

files.expected_value: 'spec.hostNetwork' should be set to false or undefined

queries.description: PodSecurityPolicy should not allow privilege escalation

files.expected_value: Attribute 'allowPrivilegeEscalation' should be set to false

queries.description: Pod Security Policy allows containers to share the host IPC namespace

files.expected_value: 'spec.hostIPC' should be set to false or undefined

queries.description: Do not allow pod to request execution as privileged.
PodSecurityPolicy should not have added capabilities

files.expected_value: PodSecurityPolicy should not have allowed capabilities

queries.query_name: PSP With Unrestricted Access to Host Path
queries.description: PodSecurityPolicy should set 'readOnly' to true in every host path allowed
Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-parca-test-connection}}.spec.containers.name={{wget-server}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-parca-agent}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{parca-agent}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-parca-test-connection}}.spec.containers.name={{wget-agent}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-parca}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{parca-server}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.description: Container should not share the host process ID namespace

files.expected_value: 'spec.hostPID' should be set to false or undefined
'spec.template.spec.hostPID' should be set to false or undefined

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-parca-agent}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{parca-agent}}.volumeMounts.name={{run}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-parca-agent}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{parca-agent}}.volumeMounts.name={{modules}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-parca}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{parca-server}}.volumeMounts.name={{release-name-parca-server-config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-parca}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{parca-server}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-parca-test-connection}}.spec.containers.name={{wget-agent}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-parca-test-connection}}.spec.containers.name={{wget-server}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-parca-agent}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{parca-agent}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.
Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory
Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes
Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities
Pod Security Policy allows containers to share the host process ID namespace

files.expected_value: 'spec.hostPID' should be set to false or undefined

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

Containers must not be allowed to run with root privileges, which means the attributes 'privileged','allowPrivilegeEscalation' and 'readOnlyRootFilesystem' must be set to false, 'runAsUser.rule' must be set to 'MustRunAsNonRoot', and adding the root group must be forbidden
Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

queries.query_name: Service Account Name Undefined Or Empty
queries.description: A Kubernetes Pod should have a Service Account defined so to restrict Kubernetes API access, which means the attribute 'serviceAccountName' should be defined and not empty.

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests
CPU requests should be set to ensure the sum of the resource requests of the scheduled Containers is less than the capacity of the node

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-parca}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{parca-server}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context
Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

metadata.name={{release-name-parca-test-connection}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated
metadata.name={{release-name-parca}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

metadata.name={{release-name-parca-test-connection}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
